hanzi-su-wiki:
貴

Значения

Почтённый, уважаемый, благородный; драгоценный; почитать, уважать, ценить

Мнемоника

Корзина (сверху) для переноски земли, наполненная ценными раковинами 貝. Используется как эпитет «дорогой, уважаемый».

Варианты

贵

heisig_chinese_memo: Frodo kept the expensive precious in the purse but did a switch with some worthless shells when he went to sleep. Heres gollum opening the purse "ahhh my preciousssssss.....why you m***** *****!!!!!.

koohiiStory1: Inside your purse is all of your money and your keys (き) etc. All of your precious valuables.
koohiiStory2: Frodo kept the precious in the purse but did a switch with some worthless shells when he went to sleep. Heres gollum opening the purse "ahhh my preciousssssss.....why you m***** *****!!!!!.

jp_example_words:
貴女(あなた): you, lady
貴族(きぞく): noble, aristocrat
貴い(たっとい): precious, valuable, priceless, noble, exalted, sacred
貴重(きちょう): precious, valuable
jp_readingExamples: 貴い (たっと.い), 貴ぶ (たっと.ぶ), 貴い (とうと.い), 貴ぶ (とうと.ぶ)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: In the middle of the ground is a shellfish that is very valuable. Inside of this valuable shellfish is a priceless treasure, and it’s just lying there in the middle of the ground.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look at this valuable shellfish. What could be inside? Pick it up and shake it about, trying to guess what valuable thing is enclosed.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You want to get the valuable thing from inside the shellfish, but it's locked and you need to find the key (き). Search for the key!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You find a bunch of keys, so you try to jam them all into the shellfish one by one, hoping one of them is the right key to get the valuable, hidden treasure.

humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: In the first article of " gui ", there is a vertical pen (◎) with a short horizontal drawing from the opposite two " claws " from the middle, and the " claws " are like hands. Like the shape of holding one thing in both hands. He Linyi believes that the meaning of being small and easy to abandon is the first article that expresses the " legacy " of abandonment.

Chen Bingxin believes that the shape of a gift in the two hands of the elephant is a preliminary article that expresses the " legacy " of the gift. Pressing " expensive " may be the initial text of the " left " that is left behind. The word " left " in the bronze inscription has several dots under both hands, as if something has been left behind, see " left ". Bronze writing is used as a person's name.

In the later inscriptions, an oblique pen to the left and one to the right were added to the original text, which is the same as the ancient text of Shuo Wen. Or to increase the lower " head " shape, " head " is " Tony Jane," the. From the inscription of " gui " in "目", the inscription means noble, and the inscription in the bird script with a hook: "Don't choose the expensive (cheap)".

" Expensive " Xiaozhuan writes " Shou ", "Shuowen": "Expensive, things are not cheap. From the sound of Pei Yu. Yu, the ancient literary 蒉."
humanum_short_description_en: The first text of " gui " has two " claws " facing each other with a short horizontal pen in the middle (◎), " claws " are like hands. Like the shape of holding one thing in both hands. He Linyi believes that the meaning of being small and easy to abandon is the first article that expresses the " legacy " of abandonment.
humanum_full_description:
「貴」的初文從相向的二「爪」從一中間有短橫畫的豎筆(◎)，「爪」象手形。象兩手持一物之形。何琳儀認為會小物易棄之意，是表示遺棄的「遺」的初文。

　　陳秉新認為象兩手持物有所贈與之形，是表示贈與的「遺」的初文。按「貴」可能是表示遺落的「遺」的初文，金文「遺」字在兩手之下有數點之形，象有東西遺落，參見「遺」。金文用作人名。

　　後期金文於初文下增向左和向右各一斜筆，與《說文》古文同形。或於下部增「目」形，「目」是「貝」的簡省。從「目」的「貴」字金文表示尊貴，鳥書箴銘帶鈎：「不擇貴戔(賤)」。

　　「貴」小篆作「䝿」，《說文》：「貴，物不賤也。从貝臾聲。臾，古文蕢。」
humanum_short_description: 「貴」的初文從相向的二「爪」從一中間有短橫畫的豎筆(◎)，「爪」象手形。象兩手持一物之形。何琳儀認為會小物易棄之意，是表示遺棄的「遺」的初文。

(Simplified: 贵)
Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 賤
Pictophonetic: 此 indicates the sound; 貝 (money) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • ⿱ Above to below
      • 中 [ zhōng ] central; center, middle; amidst; to hit (target), to attain; China; Chinese
      • 一 [ yī ] one; a, an; alone
    • 貝 [ bèi ] sea shell; money, currency
①價錢高，與“賤”相對：貴賤(ａ．價格的高低；b．指人的地位高低；c．方言，無論如何)。春雨貴如油。
②指地位高：貴族。貴戚。貴望(尊貴的門第和聲望)。
③敬辭，稱與對方有關的事物：貴國。貴庚(請問別人年齡)。貴姓。貴幹(gàn)(問人要做什麼)。
④特別好的，重要的：貴重(zhòng)。珍貴。尊貴。民爲貴。
⑤值得看重，重視：可貴。
⑥指中國貴州省：雲貴高原。
⑦姓氏。

「 貴 」的初文從相向的二「 爪 」從一中間有短橫畫的豎筆(◎)，「 爪 」象手形。象兩手持一物之形。何琳儀認為會小物易棄之意，是表示遺棄的「 遺 」的初文。 陳秉新認為象兩手持物有所贈與之形，是表示贈與的「 遺 」的初文。按「 貴 」可能是表示遺落的「 遺 」的初文，金文「 遺 」字在兩手之下有數點之形，象有東西遺落，參見「 遺 」。金文用作人名。 後期金文於初文下增向左和向右各一斜筆，與《說文》古文同形。或於下部增「 目 」形，「 目 」是「 貝 」的簡省。從「 目 」的「 貴 」字金文表示尊貴，鳥書箴銘帶鈎：「不擇貴戔(賤)」。 「 貴 」小篆作「 䝿 」，《說文》：「貴，物不賤也。从貝臾聲。臾，古文蕢。」
Elaboration: In the first article of " gui", there is a vertical pen (◎) with a short horizontal drawing from the opposite two " claws" from the middle, and the " claws" are like hands. Like the shape of holding one thing in both hands. He Linyi believes that the meaning of being small and easy to abandon is the first article that expresses the " legacy" of abandonment. Chen Bingxin believes that the shape of a gift in the two hands of the elephant is a preliminary article that expresses the " legacy" of the gift. Pressing " expensive" may be the initial text of the " left" that is left behind. The word " left" in the bronze inscription has several dots under both hands, as if something has been left behind, see " left". Bronze writing is used as a person's name. In the later inscriptions, an oblique pen to the left and one to the right were added to the original text, which is the same as the ancient text of Shuo Wen. Or to increase the lower " head" shape, " head" is " Tony Jane," the. From the inscription of " gui" in " 目", the inscription means noble, and the inscription in the bird script with a hook: "Don't choose the expensive (cheap)". " Expensive" Xiaozhuan writes" Shou", "Shuowen": "Expensive, things are not cheap. From the sound of Pei Yu. Yu, the ancient literary 蒉."

貴字的基本解释

貴
guì
见“贵”。

貴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guì］
［《廣韻》居胃切，去未，見。］
“贵1”的繁体字。
(1)价格高。
(2)指价高的货物。
(3)贵重；重要。
(4)崇尚；重视；以为宝贵。
(5)尊重，敬重。
(6)地位显要。
(7)使显贵。
(8)地位显要的人。
(9)欲；想要。
(10)敬辞。
(11)贵州省的简称。
(12)姓。汉有庐江太守贵迁。见《通志·氏族五》引汉应劭《风俗通》。

貴字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　貴； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1206第15
〔古文〕??【唐韻】居胃切【集韻】【韻會】歸謂切，?音餽。【說文】作䝿，物不賤也。【易•繫辭】?高以?貴賤位矣。【書•旅獒】不貴異物，賤用物。　又【玉篇】高也，尊也。【易•繫辭】崇高莫大乎富貴。【周禮•天官•大宰】以八統詔王馭萬民，六曰尊貴。又【禮•祭儀】昔者有虞氏貴德而尚齒。【註】貴謂燕賜有加於諸臣也。又【孟子】用下敬上，謂之貴貴。　又欲也。【戰國策】貴合於秦以伐齊。【註】貴，猶欲也。　又【玉篇】多價也。【前漢•食貨志】器苦惡賈貴。　又【釋名】貴，歸也，物所歸仰也。　又姓。【風俗通】廬江太守貴遷。　又州名。【韻會】春秋駱越地，隋鬰州，唐攺貴州。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guì］
["Guangyun" has an appetite, see you. ]
Traditional characters for "贵1".
(1) The price is high.
(2) Refers to high-priced goods.
(3) Valuable; important.
(4) Advocate; value; consider it precious.
(5) Respect and respect.
(6) The status is prominent.
(7) Make prominent.
(8) People with prominent positions.
(9) Desire; want.
(10) Respect.
(11) The abbreviation of Guizhou Province.
(12) Last name. In the Han Dynasty, the Lujiang Prefect Gui moved. See "Tong Zhi · Clan Five" cited Han Ying Shao's "Fun Su Tong".

[Ancient text]?? [Tang Yun] Ju Stomach [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] is called "Qi", and the sound is fed. [Said the text] Being silly, things are not cheap. [Yi•Ci]? Gao Yi? Noble and cheap. 【Book•Traveling Mastiff】Inexpensive foreign objects, but cheap ones.　[Jade Chapter] Gao Ye, Zun Ye. [Yi•Ci] Noble is more than rich. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Da Zai】Eight rule the emperor to control the people, and the six are noble. Also [rituals and rituals] the past has Yu's virtue and Shangfang. [Note] You said that Yan Ci was added to the ministers. Also 【Mencius】Sincerely, it is very expensive.　Yes again. [Warring States Policy] You joined the Qin Dynasty to defeat Qi. Name meaning

guì
вм. 贵
Radicals: 中, 一, 貝  (middle, ground, shellfish)
Meaning Mnemonic
In the middle of the ground is a shellfish that is very valuable. Inside of this valuable shellfish is a priceless treasure, and it’s just lying there in the middle of the ground.
Look at this valuable shellfish. What could be inside? Pick it up and shake it about, trying to guess what valuable thing is enclosed.
Reading Mnemonic
You want to get the valuable thing from inside the shellfish, but it's locked and you need to find the key (き). Search for the key!
You find a bunch of keys, so you try to jam them all into the shellfish one by one, hoping one of them is the right key to get the valuable, hidden treasure.
